summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 CROSSROADS SUNSET TRAIL RV. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE WHEEL BEARINGS FAILED, CAUSING THE WHEEL TO DETACHED FROM THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT MENTIONED THAT THE TIRES WERE WEARING PREMATURELY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHO WAS UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT DEICED TO REPLACE ALL WHEEL BEARINGS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 3,000 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 3,600.
